To install this you have to create a new folder on your HDD and then go to your antivirus settings and add that directory to exceptions so it is not scanned by the antivirus. Do all the stuff inside that folder and you will be keylogger free.

Okay so after using both of them. I didn't notice that this was supposed to be the version that can do remote installation. Trust me it doesn't. But even so that might explain why the crack file doesn't have that extra file like in the other one. Ardamax only really monitors your clipboard and can take screen shots. It doesn't actually record Keystrokes. So you can imagine the best thing would really be being able to look at what the person is viewing with the screen shots. You wont be able to get passwords and read conversations. It does say it will monitor certain instant messenger conversations but you'd have to rely on them to use the specified ones.

For those with AVG...
Open user interface.
Go to tools and advanced settings.
In the list should be PUP Exceptions.
Add exception by selecting the file location.

First, i would like to thank Ony for this great upload. If your purpose is to log anything on your own computer, this keylogger does the job, just follow the simple installation instructions.

I think what I, and everyone else found frustrating, is that we actually only want the remote keylogger function, this function does create a remote keylogger, but the version is so outdated that it dosnt work anymore. No emails with logs are recieved from your "victims", i tryed it on my own computer, and on my friends.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!!

I thought everything about this looked legit.  Plenty of supporting comments, easy installation.  Helped me catch my ex girlfriend cheat on me.  Did everything I needed it to.

Its a keylogger so like everyone else I ignored the antivirus warnings.  However what no one else noticed here (and it really surprises me) is that all your logs are being remotely viewed.  Since you unblocked it from your antivirus you would never know!  Since installing this I have had my battle.net account and my xbox live account hacked into and exploited, with unauthorized charges to my credit card. Since then I uninstalled this and had to change all my passwords. I have had previous keyloggers and I have NEVER had any account I own hacked into, and since uninstalling it a couple months ago (I had to be sure it was this) I havent had any problems.

So again,
DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS UNLESS YOU WANT YOUR KEYLOGS TO BECOME PUBLIC KNOWLEDGE!!

4. Turn off antivirus
5. Move Silent_akl to crack and install it
6. Once installed replace the POL file with the one in C:Program Files (x86)POL or 
C:Program FilesPOL
